SEARCH
Module LabAssignment
Package service

Class InternshipService

java.lang.Object
service.InternshipService
public class InternshipService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing Internship entities. Handles business logic for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting internships, including validation rules for dates, slots, and company representative permissions.

  • Constructor Details

    • InternshipService

      public InternshipService(InternshipRepository repo)
      Constructs a new InternshipService.
      Parameters:
      repo - The repository used for data access to Internship objects.

  • Method Details

    • getInternshipsFor

      public List<Internship> getInternshipsFor(User user)
      Retrieves a list of internships filtered by the user's specific preferences.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose filter settings should be applied.
      Returns:
      A list of Internship objects matching the user's criteria.

    • getInternshipsFor

      public List<Internship> getInternshipsFor(String company)
      Retrieves all internships posted by a specific company.
      Parameters:
      company - The name of the company to filter by.
      Returns:
      A list of Internship objects belonging to that company.

    • createInternship

      public Internship createInternship(CompanyRep rep, String title, String description, InternshipLevel level, String preferredMajor, LocalDate openDate, LocalDate closeDate, int slots)
      Creates a new internship listing. Validates that the Company Representative is authorized, has not exceeded their quota (max 5), and that the provided dates and slots are valid.
      Parameters:
      rep - The Company Representative creating the internship.
      title - The title of the internship.
      description - The description of the role.
      level - The professional level (e.g., JUNIOR, SENIOR).
      preferredMajor - The preferred major for applicants.
      openDate - The date applications open.
      closeDate - The date applications close.
      slots - The number of available positions.
      Returns:
      The newly created Internship object.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If input data is invalid (nulls, dates out of order, non-positive slots).
      IllegalStateException - If the rep is unauthorized or has reached the maximum number of internships.

    • editInternship

      public Internship editInternship(String id, String title, String description, String preferredMajor, String levelStr, LocalDate openDate, LocalDate closeDate, Boolean visibility)
      Edits specific fields of an existing internship using raw values. Only internships with PENDING status can be edited.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID of the internship to edit.
      title - The new title (or null to keep existing).
      description - The new description (or null to keep existing).
      preferredMajor - The new preferred major (or null to keep existing).
      levelStr - The new level as a String (or null to keep existing).
      openDate - The new open date (or null to keep existing).
      closeDate - The new close date (or null to keep existing).
      visibility - The new visibility status (or null to keep existing).
      Returns:
      The updated Internship object.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the internship is not found, level string is invalid, or dates are invalid.
      IllegalStateException - If the internship status is not PENDING.

    • editInternship

      public void editInternship(String id, Internship updated)
      Updates an existing internship with a new Internship object. Only internships with PENDING status can be edited.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID of the internship to edit.
      updated - The Internship object containing new data.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the internship is not found.
      IllegalStateException - If the internship status is not PENDING.

    • deleteInternship

      public void deleteInternship(CompanyRep rep, String id)
      Deletes an internship listing. Only the owner of the internship (matching Company) can delete it, and only if it is currently PENDING.
      Parameters:
      rep - The Company Representative attempting to delete the internship.
      id - The unique ID of the internship to delete.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the internship is not found.
      IllegalStateException - If the rep is not the owner, or the internship is not PENDING.

    • setVisibility

      public void setVisibility(String id, boolean visible)
      Toggles the visibility of a specific internship.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID of the internship.
      visible - true to make it visible, false to hide it.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the internship is not found.

    • markAsFilled

      public void markAsFilled(Internship internship)
      Checks if an internship's slots are full and updates its status if necessary. If filled, sets status to FILLED and visibility to false.
      Parameters:
      internship - The internship to check.

    • getAllInternships

      public List<Internship> getAllInternships()
      Retrieves a comprehensive list of all internships in the system. This is typically used by administrators.
      Returns:
      A list of all Internship objects.

    • approveInternship

      public void approveInternship(String id)
      Approves an internship listing. Sets the status to APPROVED and ensures it is visible.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID of the internship to approve.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the internship is not found.

    • rejectInternship

      public void rejectInternship(String id)
      Rejects an internship listing. Sets the status to REJECTED and hides it from view.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID of the internship to reject.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the internship is not found.
